data.question: What is the yield of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] when reacted with Na2[Cr(CO)5] and Cl2BAr'?
What color does the compound [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] appear as?
Is the 11B NMR shift of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] closer to chromium or amino-hypersilylborylenes?
data.answer: It is closer to the shifts reported for chromium.

data.question: True or False: The reaction of 1 with 2 equiv of KC8 in THF results in a compound that is air- and moisture-sensitive.
What is the yield of isolated product when Br2BAr' is used instead of Cl2BAr'?
True or False: The reduction of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] and [(OC)5Cr{BN(SiMe3)2}] result in the same type of product.
What is the 11B NMR shift of the compound formed upon the reaction of 1 with KC8 in THF?
What is the identity of the product determined by single-crystal X-ray diffraction after the reaction of 1 with KC8 in THF?
True or False: The reduction of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] leads to a loss of metal-bound ligands.
What happens to the boron-containing moiety in the reduction of [(OC)5Cr{BN(SiMe3)2}]?
data.answer: It suggests a selective liberation of the borylene moiety.

data.question: True or False: The reduction of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] and [(OC)5Cr{BN(SiMe3)2}] both result in compounds that are extremely air- and moisture-sensitive.
What is the yield of K2[Cr2(CO)10]·-(THF)2·([18]crown-6)2 4 after the reduction of [(OC)5Cr{BN(SiMe3)2}]?
True or False: The LUMO of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] is centered predominantly on the chromium part of the complex.
What is the main difference in the reactivity upon reduction between compounds 1 and 3?
data.answer: Compound 1 undergoes a structural rearrangement, while compound 3 leads to the liberation of the boron-containing moiety.

data.question: True or False: The reduction of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')] leads to a compound with a formal oxidation state of Cr of zero.
What is the formal oxidation state of Cr in compound 2?
True or False: The reduction of [(OC)5Cr{BN(SiMe3)2}] does not lead to any structural rearrangement.
What is the main cause of the unique reactivity observed in the reduction of [(OC)5Cr(BAr')]
data.answer: The LUMO of 1 being centered predominantly on the [BAr'] part of the complex.

data.question: What is the result of the reduction of the aminoborylene complex 3?
data.answer: Liberation of the boron-containing moiety from the chromium scaffold.

data.question: True or False: The reduction products of chromium borylenes can be selected by tuning the functionality at the boron center.
